item.title: 135 max stat and 225 max combat lvl?
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

i can give u max skil 135 combat 253 that is the best u can get[br][size=1]Posted on: March 06, 2007, 02:34:45 AM[/size][hr]Purpose: change max stats

Difficulty: 1/10

Assumed Knowledge: c&p and searching

Server Base: Tested on test(might work on any)

Procedure : go into client.java and search for

for public int getXPForLevel(int level) {

You should see something like

[code] public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

  for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) {
     points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
     if (lvl >= level) {
        return output;
     }
     output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
  }
  return 0;

}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

  for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
     points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
     output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
     if (output >= exp) {
        return lvl;
     }
  }
  return 135;

}[/code]

Step 1: Change all of that to

[code]public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

  for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) {
     points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
     if (lvl >= level) {
        return output;
     }
     output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
  }
  return 0;

}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

  for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= [MAX STAT ERE]; lvl++) {
     points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
     output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
     if (output >= exp) {
        return lvl;
     }[/code]

credits: 100% me

post if helped u
